short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects iStockphoto website to the Japanese version of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A super simple extension which redirects an istockphoto.com tab to the Japanese version (istockphoto.com/jp/). Since the website doesn't have a default language feature, non-English speaking users are often frustrated when links from overseas clients or websites are just the English-language version, resetting their language preference.

In the near future, will add a selectable list of available languages, and further internationalisation.

This extension doesn't collect any data. It only reads tabs to know whether and where it should redirect.
